direction.raw_text: Nakagawa's eyes widen as the door swings open.     He sees -- A YOUNG BOY kneeling by the edge of the tub, overflowing with water. His head hangs below the surface. Nakagawa immediately drops to the boy, lifting his lifeless head from the water. It's TOSHIO. He's dead. Drowned. Before Nakagawa can understand what's happening, the boy's eyes SUDDENLY OPEN, fixing on Nakagawa -- -- and then a PALE HAND grabs Nakagawa's head from behind and roughly pushes it into the water, holding him under. Nakagawa's LEGS flail and kick as he struggles, his SCREAMING muffled by the water. But finally, his legs become still.
